name: react-template
description: React template with TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, Jest, Husky, and TailwindCSS

scripts.start: echo '🚀 Starting the app... Please wait.' && npm run build && echo '✅ Build complete. Launching the app...' && node dist/index.js
scripts.format: echo '🖋️ Formatting code... Please wait.' && prettier --write . && echo '✅ Your code is formatted!'
scripts.lint: echo '🧹 Linting code... Please wait.' && eslint -c eslint.config.js . && echo '✅ Linting complete. Your code is clean!'
scripts.precommit: echo '🔒 Precommit: Linting and testing code...' && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.pretest: echo '🔎 Pretest: Linting code...' && npm run lint
scripts.debug: echo '🐞 Starting the app in debug mode...' && NODE_ENV=development nodemon --inspect src/index.js
scripts.clean: echo '🧽 Cleaning up...' && rm -rf ./node_modules ./dist && rm package-lock.json
scripts.docker-clean: echo '🧹 Cleaning up Docker resources...' && docker stop $(docker ps -aq) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) && docker image prune -af && docker volume prune -f && docker network prune -f && docker builder prune -f

author: Jagoda11
